description: Carrots and leeks make a sweet combination, but you can also use regular onion in this pilaf To get 1/2 cup of finely chopped parsley, begin with 2 cups leaves picked from the stems.
title: Rice Pilaf With Carrots and Parsley
title_page: Rice Pilaf With Carrots and Parsley Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Carrots and leeks make a sweet combination, but you can also use regular onion in this pilaf. To get 1/2 cup of finely chopped parsley, begin with 2 cups leaves picked from the stems.
Featured in: No Parsley Left Behind.
Learn: How to Make Rice
